title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A white car drives down a city street with tall buildings on either side, passing a red truck and a parked white van.

The ego vehicle maintains a safe distance from the other vehicles on the road and is prepared to stop or turn as needed.
